speaker: Scott Percival
title: Reverse Engineering is good and also for everyone
description: In the tech press, you have probably seen a story or two showcasing some kind of ridiculous hacking or technical feat. Maybe it's modifying a video game to have new features or characters, maybe it's rigging an ATM to play a jingle and spit out money like a jackpotting slot machine, maybe it's revealing every workstation/server CPU on Earth as hopelessly insecure in the space of an afternoon. For many, the reaction these stories evoke is roughly \
